content: {"locationId": "5664", "organizationId": "4787", "name": "Maricopa Pantry Inc", "address1": "50881 W Papago Rd", "address2": "", "city": "Maricopa", "state": "AZ", "zipCode": "85139", "country": null, "phone": "520-709-3076", "phoneExt": "", "website": "https://MaricopaPantry.org", "latitude": "32.98521", "longitude": "-112.11473", "foodPrograms": "Pop-Up/Mobile Resource", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "Parking Available", "aboutUs": "Maricopa Pantry  was founded upon the principle of 'Neighbors Helping Neighbors'.  We strive to assist area residents by providing fresh, nutritious food to anyone who can use it.  We are open every Saturday from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM, and operate as a drive-thru.  Primarily we serve Maricopa, Arizona and its surrounding communities, but everyone is welcome.  The food is free, although we gratefully accept donations to help defray our costs.  Please come and see us!  We serve an average of 1,600 families every Saturday. If you sould like to help serve your community, please come and join us!  Volunteers can come as early as 6:30 AM.  We receive our food on Thursdays and Fridays and distribute it all on Saturday.  If there is food left over, we distribute that food on Mondays - also 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM.  To find out more about us, or to verify a Monday distribution, please visit our facebook page at  Facebook.com/MaricopaPantry .", "notes": "", "contactName": "Alice Shoaf", "contactPhone": "520-709-3076", "contactEmail": "vicepresident@maricopapantry.org", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Diapers, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Household Products, Meat, Pet Food / Supplies, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 44, "regionName": "St. Mary's Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "71a2fe75-eba6-4f29-916b-d3614dd69e78.png", "website": "https://www.firstfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "US Mountain Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "MST", "offsetHours": "-7", "schedules": ["Saturday 8:00 AM-11:00 AM (Monday distributions possible but not guaranteed.  Please visit our facebook page for notifications.)", "Saturday 9:00 AM-12:00 PM (Every Saturday/ winter hours  )"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
